paper_abstract: This paper presents models of quasi-non-ergodic probabilistic systems that are defined through the theory of wave probabilistic functions presented in [10-16]. First of all we show the new methodology oil a binary non-ergodic time series. The theory is extended into M-dimensional non-ergodic n-valued systems with linear ergodicity evolution that are called quasi-non-ergodic probabilistic systems. present two illustrative examples of applications of introduced theories and models.
paper_title: QUASI-NON-ERGODIC PROBABILISTIC SYSTEMS AND WAVE PROBABILISTIC FUNCTIONS
